deposition_statement.text: I never saw those documents before today. I had no knowledge of any deposits under $10,000.

trial_statement.text: Those were legitimate business receipts that happened to be those amounts. It was coincidental.

contradiction_analysis.explanation: In deposition, witness claimed no knowledge of the deposits. At trial, witness acknowledged awareness and offered an explanation for the amounts.

impeachment_script.setup: Mr. Smith, you just testified that these deposits were legitimate business receipts, correct?
impeachment_script.deposition_reference: Let me direct your attention to your deposition of December 15, 2023, page 45, beginning at line 12.
impeachment_script.reading: Question: 'Were you aware of any cash deposits under $10,000?' Answer: 'I never saw those documents before today. I had no knowledge of any deposits under $10,000.' Did I read that correctly?
impeachment_script.close: So you testified under oath that you had no knowledge of these deposits, but now you're offering an explanation for them?

risk_assessment.potential_explanation: Witness may claim memory refreshed by document review
risk_assessment.counter_strategy: Emphasize the specific and categorical denial

deposition_statement.text: All foreign wire transfers over $5,000 require board approval. That's standard policy.

trial_statement.text: Transfers of that size did not require board approval under our policies.

contradiction_analysis.explanation: Witness acknowledged policy requirement in deposition but denied it at trial when confronted with his own policy violations.

impeachment_script.setup: You testified just now that these transfers didn't require board approval, correct?
impeachment_script.deposition_reference: Let's look at your deposition, page 78, line 5.
impeachment_script.reading: Question: 'What is the policy for foreign wire transfers?' Answer: 'All foreign wire transfers over $5,000 require board approval. That's standard policy.' Did I read that correctly?
impeachment_script.documentary_support: And Exhibit 130, the Wire Transfer Policy you signed, also requires board approval for all foreign transfers, doesn't it?
impeachment_script.close: So both your sworn deposition testimony and the written policy you signed contradict what you just told this jury?

risk_assessment.counter_strategy: Layer documentary evidence with deposition testimony

questions: You're currently a defendant in this lawsuit, correct?
If the jury finds against you, you could be personally liable?
You have a financial interest in how this jury views your actions?
This is the second time today your trial testimony has contradicted your deposition, isn't it?
You were under oath in your deposition, just as you are today?
Were you lying then, or are you lying now?

vulnerabilities_in_our_case.vulnerability: No direct evidence witness created ghost employee
